page.title: 05School Sports Day
page.content: The School Sports Day is the main event of the school year. Springholm's sporting grounds are excellent and big enough for not just Springholm to use but Hardgate and Kirkgunzeon too. The whole day is a family day out. There are fun races for mums and pre-school children. Altogether there are roughly 150-170 people involved. For the more athletic type there are sprints and long distances. There are also novelty races for the non-athletic type person. For example there is the sackrace, egg and spoon race and obstacle course. There are no main prizes like cups or shields but prizes for individuals. Altogether this day is thoroughly enjoyed by everyone. The sports were held on Tuesday 25th June 1985 at 1.30 pm.
